price: So war es. Und Wir haben ja umfassende Kenntnis von dem, was ihn betrifft.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
